name: On and Out!
description:
"On and Out" is a short narrative piece that was created to capture a familiar experience - packing your belongings to move to a new place. Created in Twine, the way you progress through this story is by clicking through different hyperlinks. This game was created for Interactive Narrative 1 at Champlain College.

Credits

Character Art: @Mewdokas on Twitter (via this Picrew)
Item Art: Taken from Canva
Writing + Programming: Myself
